Class BatchInstanceThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.core.threadpool.BatchInstanceThread

  • public class BatchInstanceThread
extends java.lang.Object
    This class used to add the threads in the thread pool.

    1.0

    Ephesoft

        public void remove(long waitTime)
        Removes all the resources for a particular batch.
        Parameters:
        waitTime - time till which system will wait for resources to be removed.

      • wait

        public void wait(java.util.List<AbstractRunnable> taskList)
          throws DCMAApplicationException

        Parameters:
        threadClassList - the list on which to wait.
        Throws:
        DCMAApplicationException

      • waitForCompletion

        public void waitForCompletion(java.util.List<AbstractRunnable> taskList,
                     long waitTime)
        Waits for all the threads in the provided list to complete execution if the wait time is 0 otherwise wait until the time.
        Parameters:
        taskList - tasks which needs to be completed.
        waitTime - time till which system can wait.
